title: Chihayafuru Plus: Kimi ga Tame
description:
The long-awaited sequel to the hit competitive karuta manga has begun!

The stage is the Mizusawa Karuta Club, soon after Chihaya and her friends have graduated. First-year Ritsu Nagara is aiming to win the National Tournament. He’s been working hard at his club activities to make it happen, but it’s not going very well.
Nevertheless, his sincere and earnest attitude moves not only those around him, but his very own “heart”…
For whose sake does he have such a strong will?
A brand-new “Chihayafuru” commences!
author: SUETSUGU Yuki
